author: Magda M
title: Warwick New York - Review
text: Wonderful stay at this hotel! Convenient location. Large beautifully decorated rooms with giant closets. All of our luggage and belongings fit in the closet. Plenty of hangers and shelf space for clothing. Room was always neat and clean since belongings could be kept out of sight. Comfortable beds. Courteous and professional staff! Beautiful common areas in hotel. Rooms promptly cleaned and and new linens placed every day. Couldn't say a bad thing about this hotel. Didn't hear any noise from inside or outside at night so we're able to get a good night's rest. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
